opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED. Petitioner’s Application for a Stay is DENIED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
